title: Amazon Sponsored Products Campaign Daily Report
description: Daily performance report for an Amazon Sponsored Products Campaign

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'Month Day, Year'

Portfolio_name.description: Name of the portfolio associated with the campaign

Campaign_Name.description: Name of the Sponsored Products Campaign

Country.description: Country where the campaign is running

Status.description: Current status of the campaign, e.g., 'ENABLED'

Currency.description: Currency code for the financial values in the report

Targeting_Type.description: Type of targeting used, e.g., 'Manual targeting'

Bidding_strategy.description: Bidding strategy used, e.g., 'Dynamic bids - down only'

Last_Year_Impressions.description: Total number of impressions in the same period last year, or null if not applicable

Last_Year_Clicks.description: Total number of clicks in the same period last year, or null if not applicable

Spend.description: Total spending on the campaign in the specified currency

Last_Year_Spend.description: Total spending on the campaign in the same period last year, or null if not applicable

Cost_Per_Click__CPC.description: Cost per click in the specified currency

Last_Year_Cost_Per_Click__CPC.description: Cost per click in the same period last year, or null if not applicable

14_Day_Total_Orders__#.description: Total number of orders in the last 14 days

Total_Advertising_Cost_of_Sales__ACOS.description: Advertising Cost of Sales (ACOS) as a percentage

14_Day_Total_Sales_.description: Total sales in the last 14 days
